entry.title: fr33thytweaks/Ultimate-Windows-Optimization-Guide
entry.summary:
Ultimate-Windows-Optimization-Guide

Introduction

The definitive Windows optimization guide for power users seeking to enhance their gaming system's performance.
Covering all aspects of Windows, this guide simplifies the process of reinstalling and configuring your new or current installation.

Requirements

  • Windows 10 or 11
  • Online access

Features

  • Compatible with Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Option to revert each change
  • Selectable optimization options
  • Security features can remain untouched
  • Scripts include #notes for reference
  • Scripts run in any directory
  • Scripts operate independently
  • Scripts are spam-proof
  • Scripts are silent
  • Caters to all skill levels
  • Minimal file size
  • Open source
  • Portable

Updates

This guide is continuously updated with improvements and bug fixes.
Make sure to always download the latest version from GitHub.

Future Plans

  • Refine the code
  • Fix reported bugs with feedback
  • Swap script downloads to GitHub
  • Port everything to a console UI script

Guide

https://youtu.be/PlACZ9Gp1xo

entry.title: danosito/JetBrainsActivator
entry.summary:
repo for activating jetbrains ides

JetBrains Activator

This repository provides a method for activating JetBrains IDEs.

Choose your platform

Windows

Video tutorial

Watch Video (may not work, old method)

Text tutorial

jb.ps1 is the script for Windows users.

Before running the script:

  • Ensure that you have activated Windows Firewall (Control Panel -> System and Security -> Windows Firewall)
  • It must look like this:

Steps:

  1. Download jb.ps1.
  2. Open it with Notepad and edit the $idepath variable to include the paths to your JetBrains IDE executables, ending with *64.exe. Delete the example provided.
  3. Save the changes.
  4. Download jb.bat, and place jb.bat and jb.ps1 in the same directory (IMPORTANT).
  5. Run jb.bat as an administrator (right click -> run as admin).
  6. Restart your IDE.
  7. Find any activation key.
  8. Insert and enjoy.
  9. Run this script periodically to ensure your IDEs remain activated.
  10. (Optional) Automate the process by:
    1. Right-click jb.bat.
    2. Create a shortcut.
    3. Place the created shortcut in C:\Users\{your_user}\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\Startup.
    4. Right-click on the moved shortcut.
    5. Properties -> Shortcut -> Advanced.
    6. Check the "Run as administrator" box.
    7. Apply and OK.

Linux

jb.sh is the script for Linux users.

Steps:

  1. Install iptables:

    • For Debian-based systems: sudo apt install iptables
    • For Arch-based systems: sudo pacman -S iptables
    • For other distributions, install iptables accordingly.

  2. Make jb.sh executable:

    chmod +x jb.sh

  3. Run jb.sh with root privileges:

    sudo ./jb.sh

  4. (Optional) Automate the process by adding jb.sh to your system startup.

Note: Using this script on Linux may block connections to account.jetbrains.com for all applications, not just JetBrains IDEs. Consider it as a temporary solution.

macOS

Still no support.

After running the script

After running any of the scripts, follow these steps:

  1. Start your IDE.
  2. When prompted for an activation key, find one here.
  3. No need to change the proxy. If you have it enabled in IDE settings, disable it.
  4. Click on activate, and you're good to go.

If you encounter any issues, try following the instructions more carefully. If you still encounter issues, contact @danosito on Telegram.

Thanks for the Linux fix by @vanquan805

entry.title: meetrevision/playbook
entry.summary:
ReviOS Playbooküìú

ReviOS is a customized version of Windows, designed to be lightweight, stable, and focused on improving performance, privacy and compatibility. It aspires to re-create what Windows as an operating system should have been - easy and simple. Now compatible with AME Wizardüßô.

‚ú® Key Features

  • üéØ Easy to use, just drag and drop the playbook into AME Wizard
  • üóë Removes bloatware and unnecessary system components
  • ‚ö° Optimizes your system for performance and improved privacy
  • üîß Integrates the Revision Tool to customize your system further

For more detailed information, see our documentation here.

üíª System Requirements

ReviOS Playbook currently supports ARM64 and AMD64 builds of the following Windows versions:

  • Windows 10 21H2 19044 (LTSC)
  • Windows 10 22H2 19045
  • Windows 11 22H2 22621
  • Windows 11 23H2 22631
  • Windows 11 24H2 26100

Any other build is not supported by Revision.

üöÄ Getting Started

Ready to elevate your Windows experience? Follow these simple steps:

[!CAUTION] It's recommended to start with a fresh, stock Windows installation before applying the playbook to avoid potential conflicts with existing software and user data.

  1. Download AME Wizard and our playbook from the latest releases.
  2. Launch the AME Wizard and drag-and-drop the playbook into the interface.
  3. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation.

üìö Documentation

Explore our documentation for more information:

  • Playbook
  • Installing Windows
  • Installing & Updating ReviOS
  • Frequently Asked Questions

üìù License

ReviOS Playbook is licensed under Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International.

ü§ù Support

If you need any assistance or have any questions, feel free to reach out to our team. We are here to help!

[!NOTE] Revision itself (and its Discord server) is not tech support in any shape or form. Before joining, please read our guidelines.

The best way to contact us is through our Discord server.
